title: Commemorative Bookmark, "President Abraham Lincoln", ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: discontinuous supplementary wefts in a predominantly warp-faced plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 28.8 x 6.5 cm (11 5/16 x 2 9/16 in.)
Tassel: 4.8 cm
creditline: Gift of Mrs. S. W. Fairchild from the collection of Louis Harmuth
description: White ribbon, brocaded in red, blue, and black. Portrait of Abraham Lincoln; part of the Emancipation Proclamation. Above: flag, eagle, and shield.

exhibitions.title: Shahzia Sikander Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection
